official_title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the Tumacacori National Monument.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain Kino Missions lands in Arizona as part of the Tumacacori National Monument. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the Tumacacori National Monument.
